consent.title: Informed Consent Agreement
consent.generalNotice: By continuing, you consent to the use of your data according to our policies.
consent.phipaNotice: This consent aligns with Ontario's PHIPA regulations regarding health information protection.
consent.pipedaNotice: This consent aligns with federal PIPEDA requirements for personal data use.

consent.confirmation: Your consent has been recorded successfully.
